description: Trusty contains a vulnerability in the HDCP service TA where bounds checking in command 10 is missing. The length of an I/O buffer parameter is not checked, which might lead to memory corruption.

product.name: NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier series, Jetson Xavier NX, Jetson TX2 series, Jetson TX2 NX

enisaIdProduct.product_version: All Jetson Linux versions prior to r32.5.1
